column4: why does my firefox skin doesnt look like my windows one? i have FF3.0 on both of OS
ff3 adjusts according to your system theme
Firefox default themes follow your OS theme. Each OS has a different one etc. You can ofc d/l specifc ff themes to override that etc.
how can i get the same skin of FF3 on windows for my FF3 in ubuntu?
more a firefox thing than ubuntu, as far as I know try #firefox
